Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_QUICK_STATUS

The basic type MILES_QUICK_STATUS describes the status of a Quick API audio handle.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 QSTAT_DONE Audio handle has finished playing or has been halted. (Debugger value: 1).
 QSTAT_LOADED Audio handle has been loaded, but not played yet. (Debugger value: 2).
 QSTAT_PLAYING Audio handle is currently playing. (Debugger value: 3).


Group: Quick Integration Services
Related Functions: AIL_quick_play, AIL_quick_status
